description: I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.
type: Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.
column5: Allowed values: yes (stored as 'yes'; original raw label: 'Yes')

description: Which of the following best describes your current work status?
type: Participant current employment status category
column5: Allowed values: employed_full_time, employed_part_time, self_employed_freelance, unemployed_looking, unemployed_not_looking, student, retired, homemaker_caring_family, unable_to_work_illness_disability, other

description: Do you use any AI-powered tools or features in your work or daily life? (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search)
type: Whether participant uses AI tools.
column5: Allowed values: yes, no

description: How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?
type: Frequency of AI tool or digital tool use.
column5: Allowed values (stored as snake_case): never, rarely, sometimes, occasionally, often, very_often, everyday

description: I often feel mentally taxed when trying to guide or re-phrase prompts for digital or AI tools to get the result I want.
type: Mentally taxed when crafting AI prompts
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: Figuring out whether digital or AI information is accurate or trustworthy drains my focus and mental energy.
type: AI trust-checking drains focus
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: Switching between my own ideas and AI-generated suggestions makes it harder to stay in flow.
type: Switching between own ideas and AI disrupts flow
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: I sometimes catch myself thinking about how to think when I use AI or digital systems.
type: Thinks about how to think when using AI
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: I lose track of what thoughts are mine versus what came from a digital or AI tool.
type: Loses track of whether ideas came from AI or self
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: Even brief sessions with digital or AI tools can leave my mind cluttered or overstimulated.
type: AI sessions leave mind cluttered or overstimulated
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: I rely on digital or AI suggestions to make many everyday work or personal decisions.
type: Relies on AI for everyday decisions
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: When digital or AI advice conflicts with my instinct, I usually follow the system's recommendation.
type: Follows AI advice over own instinct
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: I feel less confident making decisions without digital or AI input.
type: Feels less confident making decisions without AI
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: Letting AI or digital systems decide for me saves time but leaves me feeling detached from the outcome.
type: AI decisions save time but feel detached from outcome
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: After following AI advice, I sometimes question whether the decision was truly mine.
type: Questions whether AI-influenced decisions were truly own
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: Using AI tools blurs the line between my judgment and automation.
type: Feels AI blurs line between own judgment and automation
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: I worry that depending on digital or AI systems weakens my independent decision-making over time.
type: Worries AI reliance weakens decision-making over time
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: Even after I stop using AI or digital tools, my mind keeps replaying the interaction.

description: I find it hard to mentally switch off after spending time with digital or AI systems.
type: Hard to switch off mentally after using AI
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: I need time away from screens or AI tools to feel like myself again.
type: Needs time away from AI/tools to feel like themselves
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: Taking short breaks from AI or digital input helps me clear my head.
type: Short breaks from AI help clear mind
column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: When I spend a day disconnected from AI or digital systems, my thinking feels calmer and more grounded.

description: I feel uneasy or restless when I'm not able to use digital or AI tools for long periods.

column5: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

description: In your own words, describe how using digital or AI tools affects your ability to think clearly, make decisions, or rest your mind.
type: Open-text: How AI/digital tools affect thinking, decisions, and mental rest
column5: Open-text responses describing how AI or digital tool use affects participants’ thinking clarity, decision-making, or mental rest. Minimal cleaning applied (whitespace trimming, newline removal). Raw wording preserved exactly. Empty string indicates no response.

description: What is your age group?
type: Age category.

description: Country of residence.
type: Country participant lives in.
column5: Allowed values (ISO-like codes): au, ie, nz, uk, us

description: Which of the following best describes your gender?
type: Participant gender identity.
